A Hot Evening in July

A young man hesitates on a sweltering street.  
He feels sick and ashamed.  
"I can't face her again."  

---  

His mind races with anxiety and dread.  
"Why am I so afraid?"  
"I can't keep avoiding her forever."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man, burdened by debt and isolation, hesitates to leave his cramped garret due to his fear of encountering his landlady.
